other_tests.findings: Normal sinus rhythm, no clinically significant ST-segment or T-wave abnormalities.

other_tests.procedure_name: Exploratory laparotomy and lymph node biopsy
other_tests.findings: Reactive follicular and interfollicular hyperplasia and multiple lipogranulomas, suggestive of a reactive process.
Positive for IgA tissue transglutaminase antibodies and IgA endomysial antibodies.
Flattening of the villi with intraepithelial lymphocytes.

other_tests.date: 6 months after the initiation of a gluten-free diet
other_tests.findings: Reduction in the size of the lymph nodes.
